# Guiding Question

What is the relationship between languages spoken in a country to thier social and economic development over the years?


# Becoming acquainted with your data sources

The data sources we will be using for this project are divded into 2 categories:

* Primary Data
* Other Data Sources

**Primary Data**

The Primary data soruces we will use are:

* List of official languages by country and territory from Wikipedia [(link here)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_official_languages_by_country_and_territory#cite_note-DT-1)
* Countries GDP data from [(link here)](https://databank.worldbank.org/reports.aspx?source=2&type=metadata&series=NY.GDP.MKTP.CD)
*Countries Education data from [(link here)](https://databank.worldbank.org/reports.aspx?source=2&type=metadata&series=SE.PRM.ENRR#)
* Countries IQ scores from [(link here)](https://photius.com/rankings/national_iq_scores_country_ranks.html)

**Other Data Sources**

The Other data soruces we will use are:

* CountryData
